attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present we pay 5% VAT on our Gas and Electricity bills - yet to save on the use of such utilities by using cavity wall or loft insulation you pay VAT of 17.5%, is this right!!!! NO. Please sign this to encourage people to put such insulation into their homes. Also to remove 17.5% from solar panels and wind turbines.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
